name: A Fresh Point of View
description:
Close your eyes and cast your vision away to another creature in range. To target a creature with this spell you must know what they look like, though you do not need to be able to see them. 
The target of this spell must roll a charisma saving throw. On a failure you get a single snapshot view of what they could see at the moment you cast the spell. 
A creature is only aware this spell has been cast on them if they beat the casters spell save DC by 5 or more.
